title: M1: Core Loop Foundations
description: Goal: Secure, instrumented vertical slice (signup → create Moment → respond). Scope: STORY-AUTH-01, STORY-AUTH-02, STORY-DOMAIN-01, STORY-DOMAIN-02, STORY-DOMAIN-03, STORY-OBS-01, STORY-OBS-02, STORY-OBS-03, STORY-METRICS-01, STORY-SEC-01, STORY-SEC-02, STORY-SEC-03, STORY-DOMAIN-06. Exit: Events validated end-to-end; abuse reporting live; feature flags operational.
